text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump Anyone can have a test. 🥼

They are beautiful tests. 💉

Just you can't get a RESULT of the test.

Big difference.😷

#IMPOTUS45MORON 
#COVID19 #COVIDIOTS 
#Covid_19
